Text.val: Allow user to select a directory. The DirDlg is used to send back a directory name.
Fetch the filenames in the directory.
Here the FileListGet() function is called, using the variables set by the user
Because a vector is returned, it is scanned into a table for demonstration purposes
and displayed to the user. In production, the vector could be used directly.

ExpSyntax.val: 'EL18: How Do I Retrieve the Content of a File Directory?'

Text.valUnicode:
This is some random text to put in a text file.
The method shown here is an easy way to create a temporary text file for data such as DOS or XML files.
